Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Northbound Reroute near Broadway/Hollywood
ShortDescription: Northbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Hollywood and Broadway due to street blockage near Broadway/Hollywood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, Bryn Mawr, Sheridan, Hollywood, then resume their normal route on Broadway.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Broadway/Hollywood.

Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Laramie/Kinzie
ShortDescription: Southbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Chicago, Cicero, Washington and Laramie due to street blockage near Laramie/Kinzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Chicago, Cicero, Washington, then resume their normal route on Laramie.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Laramie/Kinzie.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Granville
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Granville due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Granville due to a sick customer.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
